review: The Fire TV Stick was very easy to install and intuitive to use. This is an excellent choice for accessing web-based viewing of Amazon Prime and Netflix. The ability to access my Prime Music is another plus. It is very well designed and a great value.
author: Titus

review: Powerful little streaming device at a great price. We've dropped cable after purchasing a few.
author: Courtney S.

review: Great use of the prime membership.
author: Rob McCracken

review: Received as a gift.  Great not to have commercials during TV shows and can watch any type of program whenever we want.
author: Christina Pierce

review: Excellent value for the money! Great for prime members (FREE)1
author: GruntDog1 "BC"

review: I have Amazon Prime and Netflix and it so easy to watch.  Instantly your movie or show is there. It was so easy to install just plug it on. We had order one after using it we order another one. We love them.
author: April
